Package xdi2.client.manipulator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Manipulator  
    MessageEnvelopeManipulator
    This is used to manipulate message envelopes e.g. before sending them or after receiving them.
    MessageManipulator
    This is used to manipulate messages e.g. before sending them or after receiving them.
